quote_last: Lance-Corporal Hartmann emerged from the house in the Rue de Londres.
title: The Night of the Generals
author: Hans Hellmut Kirst

quote_first: It was the urge to look up at the sky. But of course there was no sun nor moon nor stars overhead. Darkness hung heavy over me. Each breath I took, each wet footstep, everything wanted to slide like mud to the ground. I lifted my left hand and pressed on the light of my digital wristwatch.
quote_last: . It was midnight when we headed underground, so only a little over two hours had passed. We continued walking down, down the narrow trench, mouths clamped tight.
title: Hard Boiled Wonderland and the End of the World
author: Haruki Murakami
